title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Applying ABC Learning Types to Online Social Studies Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can integrate three or more interactive learning types into online courses using the ABC learning design methodology
Learners can explain the impact of learning type sequencing on course engagement based on MOOC case studies
Learners can design project-based assignments executable in smartphone environments to achieve over 80% learner satisfaction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
